name: Tartle's Raspberry Jump
description:
In Raspberry Jump you solve physics based puzzles by jumping on platforms, pushing blocks, and using jump powers.

Puzzle levels include several themes based around power ups or special blocks, like balloon blocks and light bulb blocks. To win you have to reach the flag. Levels also include a difficult to reach skill present that will truly test your skills.

Endless Mode allows you to earn points in a classic arcade style game and post high scores online to compete with friends in the leaderboard. As your score gets higher special blocks become more and more common and you will need good timing to jump from block to block.
